mapper.update: update seckill set seckill_number = seckill_number-1 where seckill_id=#{seckillId} and seckill_number>0
mapper.select: select seckill.seckill_id, seckill.seckill_name, seckill.seckill_number, seckill.price, seckill.img, seckill.limit_count, seckill.start_time, seckill.end_time, seckill.create_time, seckill.userid from seckill

select seckill_success.id, seckill_success.create_time, seckill_success.state, seckill.seckill_id, seckill.seckill_name, seckill.price, seckill.img, seckill_success.user_id from seckill_success,seckill where seckill_success.seckill_id=seckill.seckill_id and seckill_success.user_id=#{userid} ORDER BY create_time desc limit #{page},#{size}
select count(*) from seckill_success,seckill where seckill_success.seckill_id=seckill.seckill_id and seckill_success.user_id=#{userid}

select seckill.seckill_id, seckill.seckill_name, seckill.seckill_number, seckill.price, seckill.img, seckill.limit_count, seckill.start_time, seckill.end_time, seckill.create_time, seckill.userid from seckill limit #{page},#{size}

select seckill.seckill_id, seckill.seckill_name, seckill.seckill_number, seckill.price, seckill.img, seckill.limit_count, seckill.start_time, seckill.end_time, seckill.create_time, seckill.userid from seckill where seckill_name=#{seckillName}
select count(*) from seckill where seckill_name=#{seckillName}
